primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To deposit funds via wire transfer using the Ndax mobile app:

  1. Log in to the Ndax app.
  2. Tap the Wallet icon on the bottom navigation bar.
  3. Go to the FIAT tab.
  4. Select CAD or USD.
  5. Tap Deposit, then enter the amount you wish to deposit.
  6. Select Wire Transfer.
  7. Copy the banking details provided.
  8. Use this information to send a wire transfer from your online banking or by visiting your bank branch.
  9. Once the wire is sent, scroll to the bottom of the deposit screen and tap Upload Receipt.
  10. Upload a copy of your wire receipt.
  11. Tap Deposit to finish the process.

ðŸ’¡ Wire deposits usually appear in your NDAX CAD wallet within 0â€“1 business day, as long as all details are correct.
